title: Which font is this (used on RocketTheme template)?
content:
Hi there,

My experience in the past with Typophile has been very positive, so I'm hoping that someone out there will be able to help me with this...

The font can be found at the following link - it is the logo font and says 'Verti Go':

[http://demo.rockettheme.com/?template=vertigo](http://web.archive.org/web/20130414051005/http:/demo.rockettheme.com/?template=vertigo "http://demo.rockettheme.com/?template=vertigo")

If there is any doubt, I have included an attachment. Many thanks,

Alex

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sample.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130414051005/http:/typophile.com/files/sample_36.jpg) | 2.9 KB |
author: sharifi14

comments.content: No takers? I thought it was an interesting font too!
it's looks modified see the "r" & "t"... but modified WHAT? I'm not sure:( Sorry
